snippet.title: Basketball star Wells settles suit against Xavier
snippet.description: A former Xavier University basketball player who was expelled over what he says was a false rape allegation has settled his lawsuit against the Cincinnati school over its handling of the case.

snippet.title: Bolivian soccer stadium is definitely haunted, unless it's not
snippet.description: Rational minds blame a technological snafu for the mysterious shadowy figure. But more creative -- and conspiratorial -- say it's supernatural. Either way, it's entertaining.
